animatium.title: Animatium Config
animatium.minimalViewBobbing.description: Removes the view bobbing from tilting the world.
animatium.showNametagInThirdperson.descr: Show the player nametag whilst in third-person.
animatium.applyTextShadowToNametag.descr: Make the nametag use text shadow.
animatium.oldDebugHudTextColor.descripti: Makes the debug hud text color white again.
animatium.persistentBlockOutline.descrip: Always show block outline, no matter the gamemode or state.
animatium.allowOffhandUsageSwinging.desc: Swings the offhand whilst using item and holding right click.
animatium.alwaysShowSharpParticles: Always show sharp particles on damage
animatium.alwaysShowSharpParticles.descr: Always show the sharpness particles when damaging/hitting an entity.
animatium.disableRecipeAndTutorialToasts: Disables the annoying tutorial and recipe unload toasts & sound.
animatium.showArmWhileInvisible.descript: Shows the arm as partially visible whilst invisible, like spectator mode or invisibly effect.
animatium.fakeMissPenaltySwing.descripti: In vanilla Minecraft, if the player has missed their hit, there will be a 10 ms delay on top of the attack cooldown before they can can swing again. Enable this feature to play a fake swing animation during that 10 ms delay to match <=1.7.x.
animatium.showUsageSwingingParticles.des: Shows fake block-breaking particles during usage swinging to match <=1.7.x.
animatium.disableEntityDeathTopple.descr: Prevents the dying entity from rotating 90 degrees.
animatium.deepRedHurtTint.description: Modifies the entity damage tint alpha to be less like in Oranges Old Animations mod.
animatium.disableParticlePhysics.descrip: Allows particles to bypass collision logic.
animatium.hideFirstpersonParticles.descr: Hides potion particle effects coming from you whilst in first-person.
animatium.dontClearChatOnDisconnect.desc: Stops minecraft from clearing chat when disconnecting/leaving the world/server.
animatium.dontCloseChat.description: Stops minecraft from closing the chat screen on teleport/some situations.
animatium.upMinPixelTransparencyLimit.de: Makes the minimum 0-transparency value less than or equal to 0.1. This fixes textures with invisible pixels that cause issues.
animatium.fixOffHandUsingPose: Fix offhand pose while using an item
animatium.fixOffHandUsingPose.descriptio: Stops the offhand from using the NONE pose with a held item while using an item in the mainhand like in <=1.17.
animatium.removeSmoothSneaking: Remove the smooth first-person sneak animation (1.8-1.12.2)
animatium.removeSmoothSneaking.descripti: Removes the smooth sneaking camera animation, making it like it was in 1.8-1.12.2.
animatium.oldSneakAnimationInterpolation: Bring back the old sneaking animation interpolation (<=1.7)
Brings back the <=1.7.x sneaking camera animation interpolation.
animatium.fakeOldSneakEyeHeight: Fake the old sneaking eye height
animatium.fakeOldSneakEyeHeight.descript: Changes the sneak eye height to be as it was in <=1.13.2 visually.
animatium.fixSneakingFeetPosition.descri: Fixes the sneaking model offset to be like <1.14
animatium.oldSneakingFeetPosition: Bring back old sneaking model offset (<=1.7.x)
animatium.oldSneakingFeetPosition.descri: Brings back the sneaking model offset from <=1.7.x.
animatium.syncPlayerModelWithEyeHeight: Synchronize the player model to the eye height
animatium.syncPlayerModelWithEyeHeight.d: Synchronizes the player model to the eye height like in <=1.7.x.
animatium.sneakAnimationWhileFlying: Show the sneaking animation whilst flying in third-person
animatium.sneakAnimationWhileFlying.desc: Shows the sneaking animation in third-person whilst flying down like in <=1.13.x.
animatium.rotateBackwardsWalking.descrip: Rotates the entity body sideways when walking backwards like it was in <=1.11.2.
animatium.uncapBlockingHeadRotation.desc: Reverts the change in 1.20.2, making head rotation when blocking as it used to be.
animatium.removeHeadRotationInterpolatio: Removes the head rotation interpolation like in <=1.7.
animatium.fixVerticalBobbingTilt.descrip: Brings back the camera tilting when falling/flying up like it was in <=1.13.x. (Fixes MC-225335)
animatium.oldViewBobbing.description: Undoes the 1.21.2+ view bobbing change where when sneaking, your hand still moves normally.
animatium.oldDeathLimbs.description: Makes entities continue their animation even upon death.
animatium.oldBowArmMovement.description: Restores old player body movement in third-person when using the bow like in <=1.7?
animatium.oldDamageTilt: Bring back old damage tilt logic
animatium.oldDamageTilt.description: Reverts the damage tilt to it's old logic which will tilt in one direction <1.19.4.
animatium.oldCapeMovement.description: Changes the cape model movement to be how it used to be in <=1.12.x.
animatium.dontClampCapeLean.description: Removes the cape lean restriction. Disable this to match OptiFine cape physics.
animatium.capeSwingRotation: Don't move cape while swinging arm
animatium.capeSwingRotation.description: Stops the cape from swinging in unison with the body while the player is swinging their arm like in <=1.20.x.
animatium.capeChestplateTranslation: Don't move cape while chestplate is equipped
animatium.capeChestplateTranslation.desc: Stops equipping a chestplate causing the cape to be translated a few pixels away like in <=1.15.x
animatium.oldCapePosition.description: Positions the cape while sneaking similarly to <=1.7.x
animatium.showCrosshairInThirdperson.des: Show crosshair whilst in thirdperson like in <=1.8.x.
animatium.fixHighAttackSpeedIndicator: Fix high attack speed crosshair indicator
animatium.fixHighAttackSpeedIndicator.de: Hides the attack indicator when you have such a high attack speed. (Fixes MC-268420)
animatium.removeHeartFlash: Remove hearts flashing when taking damage
animatium.fixTextStrikethroughStyle.desc: Changes the text strikethrough position to make it look like it did in <=1.12.2.
animatium.oldListWidgetSelectedBorderCol: Old list widget selected border color
Returns the old list widget selected border color from <=1.15?
animatium.oldButtonTextColors: Bring back the old button text colors
animatium.oldButtonTextColors.descriptio: Bring back the old yellow hover/grayish text colors like in <=1.14.4.
animatium.removeDebugHudBackground: Remove the F3 debug hud background
animatium.removeDebugHudBackground.descr: Remove the F3 Debug Hud background,
animatium.debugHudTextShadow: Add text-shadow to F3 debug hud text
animatium.debugHudTextShadow.description: Add text-shadow to F3 Debug Hud.
animatium.oldChatPosition.description: Moves chat down 12 pixels like in <=1.8.x.
animatium.removeChatIndicators.descripti: Removes the chat indicators that appear to the left that were added in 1.19.x.
animatium.disableCameraTransparentPassth: Stops camera passthrough in thirdperson in glass/etc like in <=1.15.
animatium.oldTooltipStyleRendering.descr:
Restores the corners of the tooltip texture that were removed in 1.21.2.

NOTE: If you are using a resource pack with a custom tooltip texture, turn this setting OFF to not cause issues!
animatium.oldSlotHoverStyleRendering.des:
Restores the old inventory slot hover visual to how it was prior to 1.21.2.

NOTE: If you are using a resource pack with a custom slot hover texture, turn this setting OFF to not cause issues!
animatium.cameraVersion: Change camera position to be as it was in
animatium.cameraVersion.description: Change the camera position to be as it was in said version range.
animatium.oldFishingRodTextureStackCheck: Disable fishing rod stack texture check
Brings back old fishing rod stack texture check from <=1.8.
animatium.fishingRodLineInterpolation: Correctly interpolate the fishing rod cast line with the eye height
animatium.fishingRodLineInterpolation.de: Correctly interpolates the fishing rod cast line with the eye height from <1.14?
animatium.noMoveFishingRodLine: Disable fishing line movement while sneaking in third person
animatium.noMoveFishingRodLine.descripti: Does not move the fishing rod cast line while sneaking when viewed in the third person mode from <=1.7.
animatium.oldFishingRodLinePositionThird: Old third person fishing rod cast line position
Adjusts the position of the fishing rod cast line horizontally like in <=1.7.
animatium.oldFishingRodLineThickness.des: Restores the old fishing rod line thickness from <1.13?
animatium.thinFishingRodLineThickness: Make the fishing rod line super thin
animatium.thinFishingRodLineThickness.de: Makes the fishing rod line super thin. Overrides the above setting.
animatium.useStickModelWhenCastInThirdpe: Use stick model in third-person whilst casted
Makes the fishing rod model in third-person a stick when cast like in <=1.7.x.
animatium.fixCastLineCheck: Fix arm-related fishing rod cast line check (Fixes MC-109263)
animatium.fixCastLineCheck.description: Fixes the arm logic for casting the fishing rod.
animatium.fixCastLineSwing: Fix left handed fishing rod swing bug
animatium.fixCastLineSwing.description: Fixes the swing logic for casting the fishing rod.
animatium.fixEquipAnimationItemCheck.des: Revert changes to the equip animation / item update logic to match <=1.8.x.
animatium.removeEquipAnimationOnItemUse: Remove the equip animation when using a item
Fixes the blocking animation which plays the equip animation on use, and others.
Removes the pesky blocking delay that modern clients have. Shouldn't flag on servers.
animatium.removeItemUsageVisualInGUI: Remove item usage visual whilst in GUI
animatium.removeItemUsageVisualInGUI.des: Removes item usage animation whilst inside a GUI, for example removes continuous visual blocking, etc.
animatium.fixFireballClientsideVisual.de: Makes fire charges not place fire clientside like in older mc versions. Doesn't cause issues on servers, and is clientside only.
animatium.oldGlintSpeed.description: Restores the old enchantment glint speed like in <=1.8.x.
animatium.disableGlintOnItemDrops2D.desc: Disables the enchantment glint on dropped items. Intended to be used along side the 2D dropped items feature to match <1.7.x.
animatium.disableGlintOnItemFramed2D.des: Disables the enchantment glint on framed items. Intended to be used along side the 2D framed items feature to match <1.7.x.
animatium.itemDropsFaceCamera: Make item entities use camera yaw / face camera
animatium.itemDropsFaceCamera.descriptio: Makes item entities face the camera / use camera yaw like <=1.7.x when fast graphics.
animatium.itemDropsFaceCameraRotationFix:
Makes 2d item drops also face the camera pitch.

Turn this off if you want it to be like 1.7.

Requires the above setting to be enabled.
animatium.itemDrops2D.description: Makes item entities render 2D when it's an item (not blocks).
animatium.item2DColors: Bring back the old 2D item color
animatium.item2DColors.description: Restores the old color of 2D items by swapping the Y and Z components of the vertex normal.
animatium.tiltItemPositions: Modify/tilt the first-person held item's position
animatium.tiltItemPositions.description: Tilts the first-person held item position to make held items look like they did in <=1.7.x.
animatium.tiltItemPositionsInThirdperson: Modify/tilt the third-person held item's position
Tilts the third-person held item position to make held items look like they did in <=1.7.x.
animatium.oldSkullPosition: Bring back 1.8 skull held item position
animatium.oldSkullPosition.description: Positions the skull block items' held positions to be how it was in 1.8.x.
animatium.applyItemSwingUsage: Apply the swing offset during item use
animatium.applyItemSwingUsage.descriptio: Block hitting (apply swing offset in item usage code).
animatium.disableSwingOnUse: Disable swing animation while using items
animatium.disableSwingOnUse.description: Stops the swing animation from playing while using items (except the fishing rod) <=1.15.
animatium.disableSwingOnDrop: Disable swing animation when dropping items
animatium.disableSwingOnDrop.description: Stops the swing animation from playing while dropping items from either your hotbar or your inventory <=1.15.
animatium.disableSwingOnEntityInteract: Disable swing animation when interacting with entities
animatium.disableSwingOnEntityInteract.d: Stops the swing animation from playing when interacting with interactable entities such as villagers <=1.15.
animatium.disableItemUsingTextureInGui: Disable item usage texture in GUI
animatium.disableItemUsingTextureInGui.d: Disables the item usage texture in the GUI like in <=1.8.x (mainly rod/bow/crossbow).
animatium.oldDurabilityBarColors.descrip: Restores the old durability damage colors from <1.11.
animatium.oldItemRarities.description: Restores the old rarities for items visually from <1.21.2. (also old trident rarity from <1.21)
animatium.showHeldItemInBoat.description: Shows your held item while you're in a moving boat like <=1.8.x.
animatium.oldItemPickupPosition.descript: Removes the eye-height level item pickup position to match 1.8-1.17. Disable this feature to match <=1.7.x
animatium.legacyThirdpersonSwordBlocking: Brings back the old third-person sword blocking look from <=1.7.
animatium.lockBlockingArmRotation: Lock third-person arm rotation whilst blocking
animatium.lockBlockingArmRotation.descri: Locks the third-person blocking arm rotation.
animatium.oldBlockMiningProgress: Bring back the old block mining progress
animatium.oldBlockMiningProgress.descrip: Bring back the old block mining progress <=1.18?
animatium.disableInventoryEntityScissor: Allow full entity model rendering in inventory
Allows the inventory entity model to render fully.
animatium.legacyBlockOutlineRendering.de: Restores the legacy block outline rendering from <=1.14.4.
animatium.hideModelWhilstSleeping.descri: Hides the player model whilst sleeping like in <=1.12? Only affects you.
animatium.entityArmorHurtTint.descriptio: Tints the armor when an entity is damaged like in <=1.7.x.
animatium.forceItemGlintOnEntity: Force item glint on armor glint
animatium.forceItemGlintOnEntity.descrip: Forces the glint on armor to use the item glint texture. This therefore unifies the glint texture like in older mc versions.
animatium.forceMaxGlintProperties.descri: Forces the glint to use the maximum speed and strength by default like in older mc versions.
animatium.oldArmorHurtRendering.descript: Restores the old armor hurt tint rendering from ~1.8.
animatium.forceHighAttackSpeedVisual.des: Fakes the high attack speed visual, which stops the attack cooldown animation on items like the sword.
animatium.disableEntityGlowOutline.descr: Disables the 1.9+ glow effect from rendering.
animatium.disableModernCombatSounds.desc: Disables the 1.9+ combat sounds that were added.
animatium.disableModernCombatParticles.d: Disables the 1.9+ combat particles that were added.
animatium.oldBlueVoidSky: Bring back the old blue void skybox
animatium.oldBlueVoidSky.description: Brings back the forgotten blue void part of the sky. (Fixes MC-257056)
animatium.oldSkyHorizonHeight.descriptio: Changes the horizon height to how it was in <=1.16.5.
animatium.oldVoidSkyFogHeight.descriptio: Restores the old void sky fog height to what it was in <=1.21.1. (Fixes MC-279472)
animatium.oldCloudHeight: Bring back the old cloud height
animatium.oldCloudHeight.description: Changes the cloud height back to 128 like in <=1.16.5.
